other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm with nonspecific ST-segment and T-wave abnormalities more marked than those seen on an electrocardiogram obtained 8 months earlier.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased ST-segment and T-wave abnormalities compared to the previous ECG.

other_tests.findings: Low-grade (grade 1–2 of 3) follicular lymphoma with a follicular pattern; tissue composed of small irregular lymphoid cells consistent with centrocytes and infrequent larger cells indicating centroblasts.
Evidence of grade 1–2 follicular lymphoma in the lung.
